_subject: Your WU Transaction done at [[${_tu.prop('company.name')}]], is cancelled
_message: Your transaction dated [[${data.date}]] having Trans Ref No: [[${data.refno}]] for [[${data.foreigncurcode}]] [[${data.foreignamount}]] / [[${data.localcurcode}]] [[${data.localamount}]] has been cancelled. Incase of any queries, call customer care [[${_tu.prop('company.helpno')}]]
